name: Empathetic Eyes drop crotch Sweatpants, UNISEXX blue
description:
Unisex drop crotch sweatpants
Ready to ship in SM,LRG & XLRG

Long time Ruffeo fanatics and newbies, the Empathetic Eyes SWEATS are here! This ridiculously untamed modular drop crotch-meets skinny leg shape makes itself available to the UNISEX variety!

At home in Brooklyn @ RHLS headquarters alongside our concept store MOVES, the empathetic eyes knickers are taking on speed! We are SOLD OUT* of Empathetic eyes Yellow sweats small and medium! If you've been considering these pants in blue or one of the alternate colors it might be time to seize the moment!! These sweats are available in an extremely limited size run! 

RHLS offers custom alterations at no extra cost. If you'd like us to fit the calf down or reduce the flare at the thigh, we can do it. We cannot add fabric. *Depending on time of year you may order a sold out or custom size at $20 extra, made to order.

name: Pukey Face Long Sleeve Bodysuit
description:
Pukey Face stumbled it's way from an Emotionally Iconic sockhop and onto our new spandex bodysuit. Pukey makes it's presence known, splattered across your body with an exposed tongue slithering all the way down your left leg. Feelin green? Or should I say, chartreuse?

Made to order takes 10-15 business days.  We can upgrade your shipping for international orders to make sure pukey face arrives in time for your holiday!

Emotional Icon is an investigation of color and spacial relaitonships. RHLS is interested in entertaining the juxtaposition of expressions of emptiness and the ecstatic.

Item made to order and ships in 2-4 weeks.

MADE IN NYC

You'll never be lonely again! 
Empathetic Eyes is the original RHLS Emotional Icon. His expression emanates joy and wonder. Is Empathetic Eyes wearing you, or are you wearing him?

name: Quadrocepticon Zip Up Hoodie, Men
description:
quadrocepticon [kwod-roh-sep-ti-khon]
noun ( pl. same) Parallelity 
The investigation of spacial relationships in repetition of fours. Emphasis on obtuse triangle.

Quadroceticon appears as a zip up for the very first time. A strong addition to our all-season catalog, with a black background and a tasteful splash of color Quad transitions nicely throughout the year. Notice how RHLS honed their psychological design skills allowing shape to intersect the hips and chest to flatter your already infallible assets.

BULLETS:
*Sweatshirt fleece is 100% cotton. Sourced from dead stock. 
*Two external panel front pockets 
*Drawstring in the hood
*Fit at shoulders, chest, waist and hips. Sleeve modeled off a blazer for a formal.. yet future look.
*Custom sizing available.
*Also available in fitted womens S-L and oversized 3XL for men or women.
*Extremely limited edition 1/30
*Ready to ship in all sizes.
*Wash cold, hang dry or dry on low

SIZING (Sweatshirt fleece has 2 inches of stretch)
SM chest & hips 39-40
MED chest & hips 40-42
LRG chest & hips 42-44
XLRG chest & hips 44-46
Please contact us with any sizing questions.

Photography - Jena Cumbo jenacumbo.com
Model - Nobu Massiah

HANDMADE IN NYC

name: Quadrocepticon Leggings, unisex
description:
BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND: .

made to order. ships within 10 - 15 business days

The quadrocepticon leggings are made from semi-shiny athletic spandex. These black and metallic leggings are unisex.

The quadrocepticon concept evolves in meta and physical girth. We turned quadrocepticon insideout and downsideup upon itself to evolve our original investigation of spacial relationships into: theory realized.

A asymmetrical cacophony of metallic juts from your power point, shooting down your thighs and across your calfs.

Its the next level color layout, same awesome pattern. New semi metallic black background. White to silver to charcoal to mirror gray to metallic teal to rose to gold. Handled.

Sizing:
small 26-27" waist, medium waist 28-29", large wiast 30-31" 
Model: Tyler White

description:
Introducing the big black tee! // Introducing RHLS $TAPLE$ !!

Here's ruffeo modeling our brand new 5XL unisex big black tee.

Swooping neckline collar bone celebration.

Smart sleeves tapered at the hem and ice cream cone, cylinder shaped body make for one truly all sizes fitting garment.

photo : Jena Cumbo

name: Denim Panel Pants
description:
Mackswell/Marky Mark/Ruffeo wears our bran' new Denim Panel Pants!

Introducing a completely new modular pant. The panel pants perfectly weave drop crotch, riding pant and skinny leg jean offering multiple looks by styling high-waisted, mid-waisted or on the hips. This mid-weight,denim is 96% cotton 4% spandex to fit snug around ankle, calf and knee, yet is structured enough to not stretch out. Featuring a rich navy denim that will fade beautifully over time.

The panel pant shape has evolved with 2 years of rigorous development by designers Sherman and Jones. The 2013 version has been professionally graded into a complete unisex size run from XS to XLRG in the garment district NYC. Each pair is handmade by our expert sewing shop. Model is wearing a medium (Waistband stretches from 31-35" inches). Please contact us for specific dimensions. Custom fitting available

BULLETS
* YKK self locking zipper on waistband and ankles. Flip zipper down, your pants are locked on.
> Elastic waistband allows for a 4 inch range per size.
> Asymmetrical panels, 7 on right leg three on left
> Each panel is top stitched in matching thread to add detail, structure and strength.
> Unique panel pockets in front, pockets tucked into center in back.
> Flare at thigh can be exaggerated by sagging to add some serious street or androgynous look, or can be pulled up higher to transform pant into a more subtle formal piece.
> Limited warranty: All RHLS designs over $100 come with a limited warranty. If you damage your pants we will fix them for a small fee. If a seam busts out or unravels we will make the repair.
> Custom fit options. We can remove 1-4 inches of flare or fit calf down closer. We can remove fabric in the center back top for ladies looking to accentuate backside curve.
> Also available in cashmere-mink wool, in charcoal or light grey
> extremely limited size run on January 3rd we have: XS 3 pairs per size, SM, MED, LRG 5 pairs per size, XLRG 3 pairs per size. If you'd like to reserve your size please email ruffeo [!at] gmail.com
>Made in NYC by happy human beings. Priced competitively to other designer jeans made in factories with unregulated working conditions. (check the tag in your jeans.. Are they made in a fair trade city?)

HELPFUL FITTING TIPS.
Zipper at ankle allows pants to achieve a skinny leg look out of semi stretch denim. However you'll still need to unzip the zipper and pull pants over heal then top of foot before de-robing. (your foot will get stuck if you simply unzip and peel pants off inside out.)


CARE
Wash cold. hang dry.

Photography :Jena Cumbo www.jenacumbo.com

RHLS: MADE IN NYC.

name: SARS Guard Hoodie (Men's)
description:
This is our patented pullover hooded sweatshirt with the SARS Guard (our built in velcro face mask!). It is available in all sizes (this particular listing is for fitted Men's sizes ONLY), and in any color of the rainbow. It is made to order in NYC, and ships within 2 weeks of purchase.

Here are the classic features.

ITS THE HOODY WITH THE SARS GUARD* Yes! The velcro fastening sars guard really protects you against S.A.R.S., anthrax and international terrorism. Plus it holds your hood up, keeping you cozy while bike riding, and it conceals your identity if you want to put up art in a public place. Velcro is tastefully arranged in a sweet kriss kross pattern appearing in delicious top stitch.

Wear it: tight against face. Criss Crossed on chest. Behind the Head. Velcro it loosely, making a loop to frame your face. Wear it like a tie. Make up your own styling. Our famous SARS protection shield is as maleable as you make it.

*SARS Guard is an unique invention by RHLS, (Ruffeo Hearts Lil' Snotty) protected under copyright and street credit.

Pockets! Curvaceous inlay design fit for warm hands and cell phones and condoms.

The Fit. With over 3 years of development, the SARS Guard Hoodie is sleek perfection. Tapered in in all the right places; Long torso, Fitted sleeves.

Model - Khalif Diouf (LE1F)
Photography - Jena Cumbo

MADE IN NYC.

READY TO SHIP IN 
Gray: Small
Navy: Large

Made to order in any color/size. Takes 1-3 weeks for construction

name: Humanize Master Oversized Mesh Tank 5XL Unisex
description:
HUMANIZE MASTER 5XL MESH TANK! ONLY 2 LEFT

Geometry wraps 360 degrees around the body.. Your color revolution does not stop. 

Humanize Master is our theme focused more or color relationships versus spacial relationships. The "Master" element referrinto master volume levels. Like when your stereo is turned up too loud and is peaking into the red.. get it? 
humanize is a beat-makers term. Thats when you add swing to the beat to make it sound like its being played by a human as apposed to a rigid programmed sound. We think of our different textures and weights of sweatshirt fleece from the mix of dead-stock, vintage and new material we use.

Tank is constructed from 100% polyester athletic mesh with a cotton/poly bias tape along the neck and arms.

Our "one extra long" size is not a standard XL. It is an experimental body which is fit to the biceps and waist, with extra fabric in the chest to offer a uniquely draping tee shirt. This shirt works as a dress falling at mid thigh on ladies.

Emotional Icon is an investigation of color and spacial relaitonships. RHLS is interested in entertaining the juxtaposition of expressions of emptiness and the ecstatic.

This is the last shirt left of an edition of 5.

Ready to Ship

Cut in Sewn in NYC by the designers

name: Smokey Saul Polar Fleece Crew
description:
Introducing our most complex pieced-work design. Smokey Saul's face and ponytail are made up of 38 panels! This is a very, very advanced piece of wearable art. Pieced-work is a sewing technique combinig multiple panels to create a garment or in this case to create an image. Thats what makes this piece is special. Instead of silkscreening 5 colors in layers to make a face in a matter of minutes, we spend 16 hours on each sweatshirt. Its even harder than applique which achieves color-block by sewing textile on top of textile. Thats why this piece is totally worth $250.

Yes he has a ponytail in the back. Of course. With a purple scrunchy, duh,

Advanced and perfected conceptual 3XL size. Body is tapered at the waistband to give ladies a sexy yet oversized silhouette. For men sweatshirt lands more like a tall tee. 

Tapered at the forearm to give a batwing affect in a modern 2020 fit. Mens sleeve has an extra 2 inches of length and 3 inches of width in the forearm.

Made out of heavyweight polar fleece.. WARMTH AND COMFORT.

Handmade in NYC just for you by the designers Mackswell Sherman and Sarah Jones.

Ready to ship in mens or womens 3XL.

name: Chilled Out Charlie Leggings, Pink
description:
The Chilled Out Charlie leggings are made from royal blue athletic spandex leggings featuring Charlie, the chillest Emotional Icon. Also available in hot pink.

Designer Mackswell Sherman has a special message for you: "Guys these are by far the most gorgeous and exciting emotional icon we've come up with! Im not sure y'all realize how amazing this shade of blue is. I am completely and totally obsessed with out brand new member of the fam, Mr Chilled Out Charlie! *tip* When styling dont over think things, pair with an oversized black or monochrome tee shirt or fitted long tee shirt for an effortless and fun springtime look! xo" 

Emotional Icon is an investigation of color and spacial relaitonships. RHLS is interested in entertaining the juxtaposition of expressions of emptiness and the ecstatic.

This is choose your own adventure wearable play. HAIRDOS ON TOP FACES ON BOTTOM. EYES ON TOP MOUTHS ON BOTTOM, BASEBALL CAP ON TOP FACE ON BOTTOM (etc times a million). Pair any Emotionally Iconic leggings, high waisted mini skirt, swim/jogging trunks or linen pants with any Emotional crop-top or tee to create a rotating cast of characters on your body. We take color block further, further, furthest. Is Charlie wearing you, or are you wearing him?

Charlie leggings pair perfect with a Mohawk or Cowboy Hat Crop Top, but of course you can rock em with any regular top as next level color blocking.

Ready to ship
Available in blue or pink
Unisex fit in small, medium and large.

Proudly made by happy healthy humans NYC. (To the creators of fast fashion: please attempt to keep up)

name: BITCH FACE high-wasted-mini skirt
description:
High waisted mini skirt made from cotton/spandex blend

Available in Medium or Large. Can be custom fit down to your exact dimensions at no extra charge.

It's just a regular day at RHLS until an enchanted pog intercepts our heros paths and whisks them into the Dimension Z of Funness! A portal opens and Emotional Icon is born. 

Bitch Face is bitchin! This extremely high waisted mini offers a range of looks. Where it all the way up almost on the band of your bra to pair nicely with a crop top.. Go all the way and pair it with the Perky Ponytail Crop to form a complete face see picture 2 (you see it? the pink from her face -on your torso- blends seamlessly into her forehead. Pop on a blond ponytail.. yo! you got a face on your bod!) Or wear bitch face on your true waist to make it less mini. Wear her as a tube top! Tuck into some jeans or shorts. You see what we did right there? One skirt = 3 looks! Thats sustainable clothing design (spend a lil more on handmade in NYC, get a quality garment that does 3 things, buy 2 less skirts or tops!)

Emotional Icon is an investigation of color and spacial relationships. RHLS is interested in entertaining the juxtaposition of expressions of emptiness and the estatic. Empathetic Eyes is the original Emotional Icon. His expression emanates joy and wonder. Is Empathetic Eyes wearing you, or are you wearing him?

We have 1 small left and a few med/lrgs. 
We will make you a custom Bitch Face to your exact dimensions for $100. Ships in 10-15 business days. Just send us your underbust, waist and largest part of your hips/backside area. Yo mens! you wanna jack that Hood by Air runway vibe.. we make a custom tube top for your flashy flesh... idk just sayin you should just do it. Pssst! Custom clients may choose any background color!

SIZE CHART being conservative here, this spandex-cotton will stretch more than 4-6 inches! believe me we've had some seriously curvy ladies look amazing in our med/larges with a custom fit down waist, etc!

name: Empathetic Eyes High-Waisted Bikini
description:
Introducing the Empathetic Eyes High-Waisted Bikini, sneak peak from our 2014 all season collection.

The lips and eyes appear as the result of pieced-work technique, Every feature is a panel of fabric, not a silkscreen or sublimation print. Pieced work ensures that your swimsuit will maintain is vibrance and slight sheen for years to come, never fading from washing and drying.

Never before seen as a swimsuit, Empathetic Eyes bikini has been making a slamming first impression here in Brooklyn at Moves the RHLS store and headquarters. Ladies of all shapes have been happy with the fit and cheeky but not too cheeky leg line.

Style legs lower under butt to achieve a 50's meets future contemporary/classic vibe. The preppy boy crop works great as a throw over of scorching days at the beach or pool.

Custom leg line is available for $5-$10 a seam. Top also available in expanded chest for D size boobs or larger.

name: Special Edition Preppy Boy Mesh Crop Top
description:
Very special limited edition of our Preppy Boy Crop, only 2 made. 

The Preppy Boy Crop is a designer top made from athletic mesh. This crop lands at the belt line on low waisted jeans and below the waistline of mid waisted leggings or pants. Handmade in NYC.

WHAT IS CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE CLOTHING? Well, let us start your color revolution. The Emotional Icon concept interprets different expressions and moods then translates them into wearable art. Wear Preppy Boy with your favorite high waisted jeans or shorts to add an abstract color block to your everyday look.. Gaze deeper..hey that's not just color blocking.. you've got a hairdo on your torso! Pair with our empathetic eyes leggings, sweatpants or high waisted mini skirt and you're wearing an entire face! Thats quite the dapper do! Comb that callus back sonny, oh whatever you're adorable!

BULLETS>>
Tapered at forearm to give a dramatic, futuristic 3013 fit. Fabric removed from lower torso area to flatter form conveying a batwing, but one you're not swimming in.
Available in womens (unisex really) Small
Ready to Ship
Sneak peak from our SS14 season.
Wash cold hang dry.

Model - Greem Jellyfish soundcloud.com/dj-big-black-poodle
